pergunta: Answer: Primes are crucial in mathematics because they are the building blocks of all numbers
resposta: every composite number can be factored into primes. This property is fundamental for various mathematical theories and practical applications like cryptography.

pergunta: Finally, how many primes are there? There's an infinite number of primes
resposta: this was proven by Euclid around 300 BC. No finite set of primes can completely list all primes because the sequence is endless.
